markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rhinoceros Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2352)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 74</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Covered with thick armor and bearing a thicker horn, a _rhinoceros mask_ grants you increased momentum. If you Stride at least 10 feet, your next melee Strike before the end of your turn ignores the Hardness of objects with a Hardness of 5 or less. If the object has more than Hardness 5, the mask grants no benefit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</traits>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

>
Rhinoceros Mask (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 155 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 425 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your melee Strikes ignore the Hardness of objects with a Hardness of 10 or less.
name: Rhinoceros Mask
